amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds during FY 2016 for the Private Enforcement Initiative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for the Private Enforcment Initiative of the Fair Housing Initiatives Program under section 561(b) of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1987.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stivers amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 198 (Roll no. 307).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stivers amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 198 (Roll no. 307).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Stivers.
